attributes.action: Recognise The Humanitarian Need For Sufferers of M.E.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Greater respect for M.E., sometimes a fatal illness, within the N.H.S. and Benefits System.

Bedridden- should receive Special Circumstances Disability Living Allowance (full)25% of all sufferers

2-4years Mandatory Low Rate Disability Living Allowance (Case considered on merit for full Rate)

4years onwards Mandatory High Rate as this is generally the benchmark for permanent disabillity.

Myalgic Enchephlomyelitis or Chronic Fatigue Syndrome affects around 800,000 people in the UK and can remain undiagnosed due to a lack of willingness by some within the proffession who prefer to deny its existemce.
